Description_lang: Fracture the soul of up to $i target players within $r yds into the shadows, reducing their damage done by $s1% and healing received by $s3% for $d. Souls are fractured up to $410615a yds from the player's location.Players can retrieve their souls to remove this effect.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage done reduced by $s1%.and healing received reduced by $s3%. Retrieve your soul to remove this effect.

description_blz.en_US:
Fracture the soul of up to 3 target players within 20 yds into the shadows, reducing their damage done by 25% and healing received by 25% for 8 sec. Souls are fractured up to 20 yds from the player's location.

Players can retrieve their souls to remove this effect.
description_blz.es_MX:
Fractura el alma de hasta 3 objetivos en un radio de 20 m hacia las sombras, lo que reduce un 25% el daño infligido y un 25% la sanación recibida durante 8 s. Las almas se fracturan en un radio de 20 m de la ubicación de los jugadores.

Los jugadores pueden recuperar sus almas para eliminar este efecto.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Fratura a alma de até 3 jogadores em um raio de 20 m, reduzindo em 25% o dano causado e em 25% a cura recebida por 8 s. Almas são lançadas a até 20 m dos jogadores.

Os jogadores podem recuperar as almas para remover o efeito.
description_blz.de_DE:
Lässt die Seelen von bis zu 3 anvisierten Spielercharakteren innerhalb von 20 Metern zerbrechen und in die Schatten übergehen, was ihren verursachten Schaden um 25% und ihre erhaltene Heilung um 25% verringert. Hält 8 Sek. lang an. Seelenfragmente können bis zu 20 Meter vom Standort des Spielercharakters entfernt sein.

Spielercharaktere können sich ihre Seelen zurückholen, um den Effekt zu entfernen.
description_blz.en_GB:
Fracture the soul of up to 3 target players within 20 yds into the shadows, reducing their damage done by 25% and healing received by 25% for 8 sec. Souls are fractured up to 20 yds from the player's location.

Players can retrieve their souls to remove this effect.
description_blz.es_ES:
Fractura el alma de un máximo de 3 jugadores seleccionados en un radio de 20 m de las sombras, lo que reduce un 25% el daño que infligen y un 25% la sanación que reciben durante 8 s. Las almas se quedan fracturadas a un máximo de 20 m de la ubicación de los jugadores.

Los jugadores pueden recuperar sus almas para eliminar este efecto.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Vous fracturez l’âme d’un maximum de 3 personnages-joueurs ciblés à moins de 20 mètres et vous projetez leurs fragments dans les ombres, ce qui réduit les dégâts qu’ils infligent de 25% et les soins qu’ils reçoivent de 25% pendant 8 s. Les âmes sont projetées à une distance maximum de 20 mètres de l’emplacement des cibles.

Les personnages-joueurs peuvent récupérer leur âme pour supprimer cet effet.
description_blz.it_IT:
Frantuma l'anima di massimo 3 personaggi bersaglio nelle ombre entro 20 m, riducendone i danni inflitti del 25% e le cure ricevute del 25% per 8 s. Le anime fratturate si trovano fino a 20 m di distanza dalla posizione del personaggio.

I personaggi possono recuperare le proprie anime per rimuovere l'effetto.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Раскалывает души максимум 3 игроков в радиусе 20 м, уменьшая наносимый ими урон на 25% и ослабляя получаемое исцеление на 25% на 8 сек. Осколки души разлетаются на расстояние до 20 м от игроков.

Игроки могут снять этот эффект, вернув свою душу.
description_blz.ko_KR:
20미터 내에 있는 대상 최대 3명의 영혼을 산산이 조각내 어둠 속으로 보내고 8초 동안 공격력을 25%만큼, 받는 치유 효과를 25%만큼 감소시킵니다. 조각난 영혼은 플레이어의 위치에서 최대 20미터 떨어진 지점에 생성됩니다.

해당 효과를 제거하려면 플레이어가 영혼을 회수해야 합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
將20碼內最多3名目標玩家的靈魂撕裂並逐入暗影，使其造成的傷害降低25%，獲得的治療效果降低25%，持續8秒。撕裂的靈魂位置最多與玩家相距20碼。

玩家可取回其靈魂，以移除此效果。
description_blz.zh_CN:
将20码内最多3名目标玩家的灵魂碎裂到阴影中，使其造成的伤害降低25%，受到的治疗效果降低25%，持续8秒。碎裂的灵魂会出现在距离玩家最多20码的位置。

玩家可以找回灵魂并移除该效果。
